title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: The Executive Committee oversees all key aspects of the strategy, performance and financial soundness of the Bank. Our senior leadership group covers every aspect of the EBRD's business and advises the Executive Committee and President.

title: EBRD senior leadership visit Morocco
snippet: The First Vice President and the Vice President for Banking will be joined by Mark Davis, the EBRD’s Managing Director for the Southern and Eastern Mediterranean, and Haytham Eissa, the EBRD’s Head of Morocco.

title: President Odile Renaud-Basso: Looking forward to the 2025 Annual Meeting | We invest in changing lives
snippet: As we embrace the theme of “Expanding Horizons, Enduring Strengths” for this year’s Annual Meeting, we recognise the critical role we play in creating market-enabling environments, fostering private-sector development and mobilising capital to transform for the better the regions where we invest. In 2024, the EBRD again delivered an outstanding level of support to the people and economies it serves.
